data.name: Advent Heroes Demo
data.detailed_description:
None would speak of her origin, though in time she would know what made her different. But for Nefersila, it was evident that she wasn’t to know the whole story of her past. Yet on the same night that her protection was ascribed, a stranger from beyond the great expanse would be gifted the world of Runeria as the result of an initial breach of the isekai effect. Utilizing the resources provided by her distant associate, Nefersila soon discoverers that the stakes are higher than even she had anticipated... as the evidence increasingly points to a matter foretold by ancient writings as the first sign of the coming of the Great Advent.

This demo build provides direct access to the passage, keystone, frostpoint and Estarke missions and does not support saving your progress.

data.short_description: Demo package of a product in active development. Strangers from beyond the great expanse, connected to distant Runeria on the initial breach of the isekai effect, are determined by fate to be the key to destiny when the guardians of the distant world fall to corruption by will of an unnamed threat.
